Stixbox Function

NOM

    bincoef - Binomial coefficients

SEQUENCE D'APPEL

k = bincoef(n,N)

PARAMETRES

    • n,N : scalar or matrix with common size, such that 0<=n<=N .
    • k : matrix of binomial coefficients

DESCRIPTION

    computes a matrix of binomial coefficients 

        Gamma(N+1)./(Gamma(n+1).*Gamma(N-n+1))

examples

    -->co=bincoef(0:4,4)     
-->P=poly(co,'x','coef')
-->norm(roots(P) + ones(4,1))
